summary: Email chain between T&M Protection Resources employees discussing harassment emails sent to Mark Epstein and a missing YouTube video link from Jeff Epstein. The emails show cybersecurity analysis being conducted on threatening communications.

persons.name: Richard Frankel
persons.context: Primary recipient of emails, coordinating meeting about Epstein case and forwarding harassment emails.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: Subject of harassment emails and recipient of a YouTube video link from Jeff Epstein that is now missing.

persons.name: William Barry
persons.role: Cyber Security Analyst at T&M Protection Resources
persons.context: Analyzed email headers from harassment emails sent to Mark Epstein and provided technical findings.

persons.role: Managing Director of Cybersecurity at T&M Protection Resources
persons.context: Reported on communications with Mark Epstein regarding harassment emails and a missing YouTube video from Jeff Epstein.

persons.context: Copied on email chain discussing analysis of harassment emails sent to Mark Epstein.

persons.context: Sent harassing emails from melvyn_kohn@yahoo.com to Mark Epstein, which were analyzed by cybersecurity staff.

connections.description: Jeff (Jeffrey Epstein) sent Mark Epstein a YouTube video link; Mark is Jeffrey Epstein's brother.
Richard Frankel is coordinating security/legal response to harassment emails targeting Mark Epstein.
Simon Ragona spoke with Mark Epstein to obtain original emails and information about the YouTube video.
William Barry analyzed email headers from harassment emails sent to Mark Epstein.
Jeffrey Epstein sent a YouTube video featuring a mock interview with Steve Bannon to Mark Epstein.

events.title: Harassment emails analysis
events.description: T&M Protection Resources employees analyze harassment emails sent from melvyn_kohn@yahoo.com to Mark Epstein and examine email headers.

events.title: Meeting scheduled about Epstein
events.description: Richard Frankel schedules a meeting for 9:30 AM to discuss Epstein-related matters.

events.title: YouTube video sent to Mark Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein sent Mark Epstein a YouTube link to a mock interview between Jeff and Steve Bannon, which was later taken down.

locations: 230 Park Avenue, Suite 440, New York, NY 10169
keyFacts: Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, was receiving harassing emails from melvyn_kohn@yahoo.com in August 2019.

Jeffrey Epstein had sent Mark Epstein a YouTube video link featuring a mock interview with Steve Bannon discussing Trump and their relationship, but the video was taken down and the email/link could not be located.
T&M Protection Resources, a security firm, was conducting cybersecurity analysis on the harassment emails, tracing them through UK Yahoo email servers.
The email chain shows ongoing security and investigative work related to the Epstein case shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
